existing_features.title: Update the Weapons tab UI (`frontend/src/tabs/WeaponsTab.tsx`) to include three clearly labeled weapon sections: MELEE, RANGED, and MAGIC, each showing a list/grid of weapon entries that the user can click to select.

Replace/extend the current `WEAPONS` static data in `frontend/src/tabs/WeaponsTab.tsx` to be categorized (melee/ranged/magic) and to include, for every weapon: name, description, damage, a small set of stats (e.g., accuracy, recoil, range, handling), and an image path (served from frontend static assets). Keep all weapon data static in the frontend (no backend canister calls).

Enhance the WEAPON DETAILS panel in `frontend/src/tabs/WeaponsTab.tsx` to display the selected weapon’s image, description, damage, and stats in addition to the existing ammo type and fire rate controls (where applicable). For weapons that do not use ammo or fire rate (e.g., melee), the UI should show sensible static values and/or disable/hide irrelevant controls without breaking layout.

Add the required weapon images as static assets under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and reference them from the Weapons tab weapon data so each weapon entry can render an image thumbnail/preview.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add weapon sections (melee, ranged, magic) to Weapons tab with static weapon entries (name, description, damage, stats, image)

projectName: Add melee, ranged, and magic weapon sections with static weapon info and images in Weapons tab
